name: math-expressions
description: Perform basic equality testing and symbolic computations on mathematical expressions involving transcendental functions

scripts.install: jison lib/text.jison -o lib/lexers/text.js && jison lib/latex.jison -o lib/lexers/latex.js && sed -i /\'fs\'/d lib/lexers/latex.js && sed -i /\'fs\'/d lib/lexers/text.js
